blog.name: hd-fan-fair
blog.title: H/D Fan Fair
blog.description: For 2018, we are looking for fics or artworks with Harry and Draco, featuring food-related tropes and themes!

summary: H/D Food Fair submissions are due September 18!
title: H/D Food Fair submissions are due September 18!
body:
Submissions can be posted to our AO3 collection and headers can be sent to fanfairmod@gmail.com at any time. Please include the word ‘submission’, your name, and your prompt number in the subject line e.g. Submission, dracolovesharry, prompt 69.

Links of helpfulness: Submission Guidelines & Beta resources

If you haven’t submitted your entry and feel like you need more time, please do answer our participation survey! You may select how much time you need in the survey linked. 

(If you have to drop out of the Fair, we promise that Draco will not send Fungus-covered peanuts or Maggoty Haggis your way! We only ask that participants send us a note to say you are dropping out so that we aren’t left wondering!)

All the best with your entries and we look forward to seeing them soon! ♥

To our H/D Food Readers and Viewers, get ready for some a-maize-ing works by our participants - we start posting October 1! \o/

title: Never gonna be titled part 12
body:
You can find the previous part here : Part 1 Part 2 Part 3 Part 4 Part 5 Part 6 Part 7 Part 8 Part 9 Part 10 Part 11


Locating Malfoy on the map has been easy: he hadn’t move since he came back from Hogsmeade. Walking across the desert corridors, Harry tried to find the right words to say. If he could convince him, maybe they’ll be able to avoid a civil war at Hogwarts.

As planned, Malfoy was in the infirmary. What Harry hadn’t planned was to find him sleeping, backed against Pansy’s bed, his wand in his hands. Zabbini was nowhere in sight, but it definitely was his jacket on the blonde’s shoulders. Biting his lower lips, Harry took a quiet step toward the bed, unsure if he wanted to wake him up or not. He looked beautiful, finally appeased.

“He’s always prettier when he’s asleep.” Murmured a voice against his ears, sending shivers down his spine. “A move and I’ll hex you, am I being understood?

-I’m here to talk, that’s all.

-At midnight?

-It’s not as if that could wait tomorrow morning.

-‘kay then. Just know I don’t trust you.” He warned, leaving his side to get to Malfoy’s. “Draco” he whispered, his lips brushing the pale skin as he talks. “you need to wake up, love.

-Two more minutes please. I was dreaming. I was flying above the lake” he smiled, eyes still closed, leaning in Zabbini’s warmth. “I wish I could stay inside my dreams forever.” he slightly laughed of himself, dropping a kiss on his boyfriend’s neck.

Malfoy’s voice at that precise moment felt like the only sound Harry would like to hear before dying. Feeling his blush spread wider as he imagined the blond git waking up to him, he did the only think his brain could think of :  turning around to face a wall and pretend to give them some privacy. It was stupid, all of this was stupid. He was there to make a battle plan with Malfoy, not feeling … things.

“Potter’s here to talk.

-Potter?

-Hi.

-Hi. What do you want?

-Talk about what happened today. I’m kinda afraid it’s gonna degenerate.

-Who’s to blame..

-Let’s wait to be in the office to fight guys. No one wants to wake up Pansy. And you can turn around Golden Boy, no one’s naked yet.”

“How’s Pansy? I thought no one had been injured.” Harry asked as the three of them sat around Madam Pomfrey’s desk.

“Physically she’s fine but she couldn’t stop crying and shivering so madam Pomfrey is keeping her for the night. It’s been a hard day.” Malfoy casually explained. A stranger would have found him particularly cold hearted, giving no fuck to his best friend breakdown, but both Harry and Zabbini knew better. The extreme righteousness of his posture and his too slow breathing couldn’t mislead them; he was making surhuman effort to keep his composure. “Then, what did you wanted to talk about?  

-Firstly I want it to be clear: it wasn’t deliberate. She was waiting alone and I thought that she could wait with us. I didn’t knew that Ginny would take it that way.

-Potter, we’re in the middle of the night and I’d like to get back to sleep, so please, come straight to the fact.

-I fear a kind of civil war. You have to talk to the Slytherins, tell them it was an accident. Tell them that we had never want Pansy to get hurt.

-An accident? An accident! Your best friend accused her of killing his brother and you’re talking about accident? She thought you had forgiven her, that you were somehow friendly.

-I should’ve brought Hermione.” He mumbled for himself as Malfoy was visibly losing his attire of play/pretend. If he misused another word, the all situation would have been worsened. And Zabbini seemed to know it too, as he put a hand on his tight and drew little circles with his thumb.

“What do you clearly want?” Zabbini asked, getting his attention back. “What do you think Slytherins want? Equality. We, as a house, have been treated like shit since the war and we’ve endure it all without a word louder than the other. Even those who hadn’t participate in the war. They all shut their mouth in respect and took the blame to ease the pain. We also lose people, and not only death eaters or Volde

-Don’t say his name.

-or some allies of the Dark Lord but that’s something no one wants to hear about. You don’t have the right to ask them to shut up, as it what they’ve done for months. You have to ask your tribe to start thinking, for once.

-Zabbini, you don’t get it. If we don’t do something now, then the gap between our houses will no longer be crossable.

-Ask Ronald and Ginevra to apologize publically.

-I’m afraid they won’t.

-Potter, I don’t think you understand what Blaise has been trying to say: people, and I say people because some Ravenclaws and Huffelpuff are tired of this too. Pansy didn’t take part in the war. She’d never said a word against muggle born or half blood. She just never cared about that. But because she’s a Slytherin, she’s a murderer; well, she isn’t. She’s sweet and caring and she would never hurt someone based on its blood or family. Blaise didn’t want to say this aloud, but Hell I can. I am the only death eater and death eater’s heir at Hogwarts. The others are dead, at Azkaban, didn’t come back or left the school. I am the only one here who’s guilty. But in the eyes of the Weasels, every Slytherin is. And when it’s voice out by the Golden Trio, by the ones who Saved Us All, morons start to think that they’re allowed to act consequently, because they believe it too. And it’s time for it to change. Some people are tired of this fucking Manicheism where all Slytherin are evils and those people, I’m not going to quiet them.

-And if they doesn’t want to apologize?

-Then wake them up at midnight.

-I’m here for a B plan, Malfoy, not for your sarcasm. We need to do something to make them all see that Slytherins and Gryffondor can get along.

-Wait a sec.” Zabbini interrupted. “Are you here as Potter or as The Saviour?

-What? I’m not doing this for fame or whatever bullshit

-No no no, I mean, are you here to make an alliance between the Saviour and the Ex Death Eater? Do you really believe that this would work?

-Why wouldn’t it?

-Because you have to befriend Slytherins, not Draco, and you don’t. We’re the only ones you’re talking to, you’ve been sending the wrong message. Hang with Nott, take him as your anchor point in the breakfast table tomorrow morning. Make yours see that they’re the same. Everyone isn’t able to forgive yet, but there is no need to forgive the innocent. That could work. If everyone’s okay with it, I’m telling Theo right now.”

“Do you really think it’s gonna work?” Malfoy asked as Harry was starting to leave. “Do you really think things can get better? Since 6th year, I felt like time had kinda stopped, but since I’m out of Azkaban, I feel like it’s even slower. Watching the Dark Lord rise was like living my childhood nightmares where the monsters seemed so real I had no other choice than running to my parent’s bed. You killed him, you killed the monster. But the fear we all felt, it’s still in the air. We’re breathing it in and out. Fear, pain and anger, that’s our new atmosphere. I don’t know if it’s gonna work. The wounds haven’t healed yet, have they? And Ronald, he was right. He lost his brother and you’re here trying to protect me. I- I think I have a plan C. Befriend the rest of the Slytherin, but make me the enemy. They need someone to hate, someone to hold responsible for the horror that happened.

-Malfoy, you can’t ask me that. You’re already beaten up or hex every week, it would only get worse.

-I’d rather get beaten up every day that stay at the bedside of another friend. And I’m not asking for your permission. If we want things to change, we have to make sacrifice.

-You cannot sacrifice yourself.

-Said the boy who walked to the forest, certain to find death.

-I had no choice, I was an horcruxe.

-And I’m not gonna die. They’re kids and teens, Potter. I’ve been through worse. Just don’t say a word to Blaise. He wouldn’t understand.


thank you for reading ! :)

@secretlycrazyhummingbird @nothingsronwithme @eatabus  @ladyseidenlocke @alexandriarenee @cutecactusqueen @joyfulblazestarlightlove

“How’s Pansy? I thought no one had been injured.” Harry asked as the three of them sat around Madam Pomfrey’s desk.

“Physically she’s fine but she couldn’t stop crying and shivering so madam Pomfrey is keeping her for the night. It’s been a hard day.” Malfoy casually explained. A stranger would have found him particularly cold hearted, giving no fuck to his best friend breakdown, but both Harry and Zabbini knew better. The extreme righteousness of his posture and his too slow breathing couldn’t mislead them; he was making surhuman effort to keep his composure. “Then, what did you wanted to talk about?  

-Firstly I want it to be clear: it wasn’t deliberate. She was waiting alone and I thought that she could wait with us. I didn’t knew that Ginny would take it that way.

-Potter, we’re in the middle of the night and I’d like to get back to sleep, so please, come straight to the fact.

-I fear a kind of civil war. You have to talk to the Slytherins, tell them it was an accident. Tell them that we had never want Pansy to get hurt.

-An accident? An accident! Your best friend accused her of killing his brother and you’re talking about accident? She thought you had forgiven her, that you were somehow friendly.

-I should’ve brought Hermione.” He mumbled for himself as Malfoy was visibly losing his attire of play/pretend. If he misused another word, the all situation would have been worsened. And Zabbini seemed to know it too, as he put a hand on his tight and drew little circles with his thumb.

“What do you clearly want?” Zabbini asked, getting his attention back. “What do you think Slytherins want? Equality. We, as a house, have been treated like shit since the war and we’ve endure it all without a word louder than the other. Even those who hadn’t participate in the war. They all shut their mouth in respect and took the blame to ease the pain. We also lose people, and not only death eaters or Volde

-Don’t say his name.

-or some allies of the Dark Lord but that’s something no one wants to hear about. You don’t have the right to ask them to shut up, as it what they’ve done for months. You have to ask your tribe to start thinking, for once.

-Zabbini, you don’t get it. If we don’t do something now, then the gap between our houses will no longer be crossable.

-Ask Ronald and Ginevra to apologize publically.

-I’m afraid they won’t.

-Potter, I don’t think you understand what Blaise has been trying to say: people, and I say people because some Ravenclaws and Huffelpuff are tired of this too. Pansy didn’t take part in the war. She’d never said a word against muggle born or half blood. She just never cared about that. But because she’s a Slytherin, she’s a murderer; well, she isn’t. She’s sweet and caring and she would never hurt someone based on its blood or family. Blaise didn’t want to say this aloud, but Hell I can. I am the only death eater and death eater’s heir at Hogwarts. The others are dead, at Azkaban, didn’t come back or left the school. I am the only one here who’s guilty. But in the eyes of the Weasels, every Slytherin is. And when it’s voice out by the Golden Trio, by the ones who Saved Us All, morons start to think that they’re allowed to act consequently, because they believe it too. And it’s time for it to change. Some people are tired of this fucking Manicheism where all Slytherin are evils and those people, I’m not going to quiet them.

-And if they doesn’t want to apologize?

-Then wake them up at midnight.

-Why wouldn’t it?

-Because you have to befriend Slytherins, not Draco, and you don’t. We’re the only ones you’re talking to, you’ve been sending the wrong message. Hang with Nott, take him as your anchor point in the breakfast table tomorrow morning. Make yours see that they’re the same. Everyone isn’t able to forgive yet, but there is no need to forgive the innocent. That could work. If everyone’s okay with it, I’m telling Theo right now.”

“Do you really think it’s gonna work?” Malfoy asked as Harry was starting to leave. “Do you really think things can get better? Since 6th year, I felt like time had kinda stopped, but since I’m out of Azkaban, I feel like it’s even slower. Watching the Dark Lord rise was like living my childhood nightmares where the monsters seemed so real I had no other choice than running to my parent’s bed. You killed him, you killed the monster. But the fear we all felt, it’s still in the air. We’re breathing it in and out. Fear, pain and anger, that’s our new atmosphere. I don’t know if it’s gonna work. The wounds haven’t healed yet, have they? And Ronald, he was right. He lost his brother and you’re here trying to protect me. I- I think I have a plan C. Befriend the rest of the Slytherin, but make me the enemy. They need someone to hate, someone to hold responsible for the horror that happened.

-Malfoy, you can’t ask me that. You’re already beaten up or hex every week, it would only get worse.

-I’d rather get beaten up every day that stay at the bedside of another friend. And I’m not asking for your permission. If we want things to change, we have to make sacrifice.

-You cannot sacrifice yourself.

-Said the boy who walked to the forest, certain to find death.

-I had no choice, I was an horcruxe.

-And I’m not gonna die. They’re kids and teens, Potter. I’ve been through worse. Just don’t say a word to Blaise. He wouldn’t understand.

-‘kay then. Just know I don’t trust you.” He warned, leaving his side to get to Malfoy’s. “Draco” he whispered, his lips brushing the pale skin as he talks. “you need to wake up, love.

title: Bleeding Love
body:
Chapter 1

Hi, I want to try getting a series of this started. So if you this please please, like and reblog. I am open to any ideas on how this is series is gonna go.  I really hope you all like this so lets get started shall we?

Warnings: Depression, Smut later in the series, Cursing

Parings: Draco Malfoy x (OC) Nicole Ollivander (She’s a little thicc)

Summery: Ollivander’s Great Granddaughter falls in love with Draco Malfoy in her first year at Hogwarts. As a Hufflepuff how can she love him when all her friends tell her that he is evil and no good. Even her great grandad thinks it is not a good idea to love a Malfoy. How is she supposed to live her life when no one close to her is supportive. Genny her best friend in her year is the only one who knows of her love for him, She promised not to tell Nicole’s secret to anyone expectably the Golden Trio. Not to mention how all of her family but her beloved great grandpa, constantly put her down because of her weight. Over all her life sucks. (Sorry I suck at summaries)

Nicole’s p.o.v

*At the Burrow – In Genny’s bedroom Year 5 (during the ½ blood prince)*

Dear Diary,

              Why is my life so hard? I mean it’s way less deadly and stressful than Harry Potters life and I wouldn’t trade him lives for even a second; but still is a pain and sometimes I could just be my self and love who I want with out people bitching about it. I mean I am scared to even tell my best friend, Genny, because I am terrified that she will one hate me and two never want anything to do with me ever again. I mean my crush’s dad gave her a bloody diary that made her open the Chamber of Secrets. She hates him for that. It almost caused her to lose her life, how could I be such an awful of a friend.

              I mean she is so amazing to me, since she’s way more bad ass than me she sticks up for me, even though we are not in the same house. I mean she’s a Gryffindor and I am a Hufflepuff. Why would she do that, even her brother and his friends do.  My own family doesn’t even care for me that much. Which brings me to why I’m here at the Burrow staying here for the rest of the summer. Genny begged me to ask my mum to see if I could come over and stay till school starts. My parents of course agreed I was out of their hair, I wasn’t embarrassing them when they went out as a family. See I am not what my mom wants in a daughter. I can be loud while her motto is “A lady should be seen, not heard”. I like to be comfortable in my clothes, she wants me to wear a corset; mainly because to her I am fat. Which I don’t think is true and Molly tells me it all the time. I mean I am so much shorter than everyone standing at only 5’2. That means weight just looks over proportioned if that makes se

              “Soooo, whatcha doing Nic?” Genny said ripping me from the little world I was in. I had thought she was a sleep so I was writing in my diary.

              “Nothing really, I was just writing.” I said as I tapped my wand on the little book making all the ink and words I just wrote go into hiding. It’s not like I didn’t trust her I just didn’t trust Ron. He’s gone through the damn thing way to many times.

              “Uh, that’s totally what you where doing,” She giggled rolling her eyes “anyways can you get your lazy bum up? I do not want to be in the same room as mum and Flem by myself.” I laughed at this. Both her and Molly hated Fletur, her older brother Bill’s fiancé. It was comical to see them all be in the same space.

              “You know she is nice if you get to know her.” I said holding back more laughs, “But I am starving and I was waiting for you to get up anyways.” As I got up to pull my robe over my nightie. All she did was roll her eyes and put her own robe on as well. Then we set off down the stair cases that I had learned not to fall down through the years. When we arrived in the kitchen we saw ‘Flem’ and Molly in the kitchen.

              “Hey Mum.” Genny said waving at her mum tiredly.

              “Hey Mu-Molly…” I said with a blush that I had almost called her mum.

              As she was flipping eggs in a pan with her wand she looked relieved that someone had come to help make the atmosphere less awkward. “Oh good morning girls! Have a seat and I’ll get you some breakfast. Oh and Nicole, dearie, you can call me Mum I don’t mind.” She said with a smile. Now seaming happier now that she was no longer alone with the blonde French girl. She filled up our plates with all kinds of food. She gave me a little less than Genny because she knew a Weasley size portion would give me anxiety due to the eating disorder my mother had installed in me. Genny, Molly and I started to talk about the up coming school year. I had gotten a letter at the end of last week saying that I was chosen to be a prefect for Hufflepuff. Along with a golden badge with a P on it. We were having a comfortable conversation even when Fleur would add random comments about our conversation. That was until Molly asked me a question that I couldn’t answer for them with out hurting my best friends feelings.

              “Nicole dear, do you have any crushes’ at school?” by the time she asked this the golden trio had just sat down to breakfast.

              “U-um… No.. uh I don’t think… s-so..” replying to that without shuttering was down right impossible. Genny gave me a look that basically said ‘I know you are lying and when we get back up to my room you are telling me’. Molly I guess thought it was odd too but just as she was about to question me further Hemione jumped up and pointed to the 5 owls coming at the house. They were our school owls, Hemione looked as if she had seen a Swooping Evil and not an owl. I silently thanked the owls for coming at that time.

              We all looked over our notes and everything, Ron and his mum argued. Then she told us all to get dressed because we were going to Diagan Ally (don’t think I spelled that right but I am too lazy to look it up…).

I wore a black short sweater dress that had a peak a boo hole in the back, my black and red combat boot heals, a necklace set that my great grandpa gave me, my lip and nose rings, and all my normal rings on my hands. I pulled my blonde hair back in a high pony tail grabbed my bottomless bag and wand then headed out to the Ministry car Molly and Mr. Weasley got because of Harry. As we pulled out of the Burrows drive way I drifted off.

A/N: I’m ending it here because it is 2:31 am and I am exhausted. Just let me know how you think this went! Don’t for get to like, follow and reblog to give a Badger some flowers!!!!!!!!!!!
